Item 2.02 - Results of Operations and Fi.content: On January 22, 2025, Johnson & Johnson issued the attached press release (Exhibit 99.1) announcing its sales and earnings for the fourth quarter and full year ended December 29, 2024.

subsections.Exhibit 99.1: Press Release dated January 22, 2025 for the period ended December 29, 2024
subsections.Exhibit 99.2: Unaudited Comparative Supplementary Sales Data and Condensed Consolidated Statement of Earnings for the fiscal fourth quarter and full year
subsections.Exhibit 104: The cover page from this Current Report on Form 8-K, formatted in Inline XBRL.
